Package model

Class Toy

java.lang.Object
model.Toy
Direct Known Subclasses:
Animal, BoardGame, Figure, Puzzle
public abstract class Toy extends Object
Abstract class Toy for Animal, BoardGame, Figure, and Puzzle class.
Version:
03-010-2024
Author:
Bryan, John

    • Toy

      public Toy(String category, String serialNumber, String name, String brand, double price, int availableCount, int minAgeAppropriate)

      category - To initialize toy type
      serialNumber - To initialize serialNumber
      name - To initialize name
      brand - To initialize brand
      price - To initialize price
      availableCount - To initialize availableCount

    • validateSerialNumber

      public static boolean validateSerialNumber(String serialNumber)
      OLD CODE: just checks serialNumber is 10 digits long but we have better validation now.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
